The Fresh Seasons, Fresh Veggie & Ranch Cup is being recalled because it contains cauliflower that was recalled by Mann Packing Co., Inc. because it has the potential to be contaminated with Listeria monocytogenes.    This recall is connected to a voluntary recall of vegetable products announced by Mann Packing Co., Inc. on November 3 after they were notified by the Food and Drug Administration and the Canadian Food Inspection Agency of potential contamination.
